ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: I have had my ob staff for quite a while now, it has never recharged.   I dont think there is any way currently to do it. Mr. J Daniels
ygData.messageBody:
I have had my ob staff for quite a while now, it has never recharged. I
dont think there is any way currently to do it.
